WorkItem.Summary: VS2010 in Virtual Machine - compilation error?

Comments.Message:
I think the problem is that when the .zip files are downloaded, they are marked as being from another computer and are blocked (File Properties / General / Security:).  It seems that the unzipped files inherit the blocked attribute, and canâ€™t be cleared.  On my system, it was necessary to 'Unblock' the .zip file before unzipping the binaries.

I hope this helps!
